article_title: Adam Linker leaving NC Justice Center for Reynolds Charitable Trust
article_text:
Linker will help oversee $17M in annual grants to NC health care organizations

For past 8 years at Justice Center, Linker was an organizer and lobbyist

Winston-Salem trust helps fund Affordable Care Act outreach and the NC Justice Center

article_metadata.news-keywords: Adam, Linker, NC, Justice Center, Kate, B, Reynolds, Charitable, Trust, Health, Care, Program, Officer
article_metadata.description: After eight years at the N.C. Justice Center, heath care policy analyst Adam Linker will be taking a new job next Monday with the Kate B. Reynolds Charitable Trust.
article_metadata.title: Adam Linker leaving NC Justice Center for Reynolds Charitable Trust | News & Observer
